description:
Don't sweat the small stuff. Or hot days spent outside. Because with the Calder Short Sleeve Pocket Top for men, you can stop worrying about the sun when you've sweated off your sunscreen, as this top offers plenty of protection from its rays.

Another bonus? It's made from a fabric that dries quickly when wet, which makes it the perfect fit for both hiking days and beach stays.
name: Prana Calder SS Pocket Top - Mens
